sourcesContent:
import Head from "next/head"; import { Power2, gsap, TweenLite } from "gsap"; import { useRef, useEffect } from "react" export default function Base({ children, route }) { const hamburger = useRef(null); const rubriques = useRef(null); const rubriques_mobile = useRef(null); //const rubriques_mobile_item = useRef(null) const menuTL = gsap.timeline({ defaults: { duration : 5, ease : Power2.easeOut }, paused: true }) useEffect(() => { menuTL .to(hamburger.current, { left: "unset", right: 0, }) .to(rubriques.current, { height: "auto", }, "-=1") .add( TweenLite.to(rubriques_mobile.current, { transform: "translateX(0)", }, "-=1") ) .add( TweenLite.from(rubriques_mobile.current.children, { transform: "translateX(-100%)", opacity: 0, delay: (index, element, all) => { return index * 0.2 } }, '-=1') ) .reverse() }, []) const handleClick = function () { if (menuTL.reversed()) { menuTL.play() } else { menuTL.reverse() } } return (
